text: Me Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiam atera Devitɨn Nguibar Ekiamɨn aven izir dughiamɨn, Solɨn guivim Mikal winduan tughav ikia men gari. A uan pam Atrivim Devitɨn garima, a ighiabagh amuava Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn tintinibar uabɨ fakurava, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fe. Devit amir arazir kam, Mikal bar a gifongezir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn amizɨ a navir kuram Devitɨn ikia a baseme.
